name: ANTHOLOGY — Maintaining maintainers with Stormy Peters, Dr. Dawn Foster &  Angie Byron at OSS NA 2023 (Changelog Interviews #542)
summary: This week on The Changelog we’re continuing our Maintainer Month series by taking to you back to the hallway track of The Linux Foundation’s Open Source Summit North America 2023 in Vancouver, Canada. Today’s anthology episode features: Stormy Peters (VP of Communities at GitHub), Dr. Dawn Foster (Director of Open Sour...
